joke: Two nuns were driving through a Transylvanian forest when the road was blocked by a fearsome looking vampire. “What do we do now?” the passenger asked. “Get out and show him your Cross,” said the nun in the driving seat. So the nun in the passenger stepped out onto the road, wagged her finger and exclaimed: “Get out of our way, you stupid vampire.”
